long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Block Blast Match 3 Little Game: An Innovative Block Placement and Match 3 Puzzle Game

Welcome to Block Blast Match 3 Little Game! This is an innovative block placement and match 3 puzzle game that brings a fresh gaming experience. In this game, you'll need to strategically place blocks and perform match 3 operations to unlock levels and achieve high scores.

Key Features:

Innovative Block Placement Mechanism: Unlike traditional match 3 games, Block Blast Match 3 Little Game introduces a block placement mechanism. You need to select and place blocks in a way that creates match 3 combinations with blocks of the same color, clearing them and earning points.
Diverse Level Designs: The game features multiple meticulously designed levels, each with different challenges and objectives. You'll need to use your wits and strategies to strategically place blocks within a limited number of moves to complete the level objectives.
Powerful Power-ups and Skills: In the game, you can earn powerful power-ups and skills by clearing specific blocks or completing certain tasks. These power-ups and skills will help you achieve higher scores and better performance in the game.
Reward System: The game offers a rich reward system, including daily login rewards, achievement rewards, and leaderboard rewards. By participating in the game and completing specific tasks, you'll earn various rewards, enhancing your gaming experience and sense of achievement.
Stunning Graphics and Sound Effects: Block Blast Match 3 Little Game features beautiful graphics and sound effects that provide players with a visual and auditory delight. From the animations of the blocks to the music accompaniment, you'll be immersed in the world of the game.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
